function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Possible virus exposure in the workplace due to infected employees.","Impact":"Potential spread of COVID-19 within the workplace, leading to employee illness and increased absenteeism.","Mitigation":"Implement a response plan for isolating, transporting, and sanitizing infected employees. Also, maintain effective record-keeping for tracing exposed individuals.","Technologies":"Employee tracking systems, contactless communication devices, temperature screening technology.","People":"Employees, visitors, and anyone present in the workplace.","Owner":"Employers, health and safety officers, HR personnel."},{"Description":"High level of human interactions in the workplace.","Impact":"Increased risk of virus transmission among employees due to close contact, leading to potential outbreaks.","Mitigation":"Minimize human interactions by altering shifts, encouraging online meetings, and dividing employees into small non-interchangeable groups. Provide contactless communication and implement screening measures at multiple entrances.","Technologies":"Contactless communication devices, employee tracking systems, temperature screening technology.","People":"Employees, visitors, and anyone present in the workplace.","Owner":"Employers, health and safety officers, HR personnel."},{"Description":"Inadequate hygiene and sanitization practices in the workplace.","Impact":"Increased risk of virus transmission due to poor hygiene, leading to potential outbreaks and employee illness.","Mitigation":"Implement strict hygiene and sanitization practices, provide necessary supplies, and enforce regular cleaning protocols. Also, adopt a record-keeping system for tracking sanitization activities.","Technologies":"Sanitization equipment, employee tracking systems, record-keeping software.","People":"Employees, visitors, and anyone present in the workplace.","Owner":"Employers, janitorial staff, health and safety officers."}]}
